website_summaries.verdict: The 16th iteration of the Brooks Glycerin gained overwhelming positive feedback from its users, with special notes on its responsive cushioning, stylish design, and overall fit. Many attested to its impressive performance, but others found the price a bit pricey. Overall, the Brooks Glycerin 16 is indeed a fantastic road shoe for neutral runners.
pros: A significant number of purchasers described the Brooks Glycerin 16 as a “very comfortable’ running shoe
Many people noted that the shoe feels true to size
A lot of testers welcomed the shoe’s new upper
they mentioned that it looks nice and stylish
Several purchased loved the lightweight design of the Glycerin 16
Those who have tried the shoe admired the upper unit’s breathable coverage
The shoe needs no break-in period, said some happy runners
Some users have taken note of the shoe’s sock-like fit and stretchy upper
More than a handful of users mentioned that the cushioning of the shoe is great for long-distance running
cons: The Brooks Glycerin 16 is slightly expensive
A few users found the cushioning to be too soft for their liking

customer_reviews.title: Breaking in period required.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes, to use in my running rotation. Mainly on my long runs and recovery days. I anticipated that they would be buttery smooth and comfortable. I was initially disappointed. They felt hard and unresponsive. In hindsight, they needed breaking in. After about 100 miles, they began to feel really comfortable. The outsole has great grip and traction. I would say for the winter, these are warm, the upper is quite heavy, but I'd be reclautant to use them in the heart of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is what you expect and durable materials.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Brooks and second Glycerin. Really like this brand. Hard wearing, comfortable and support foot well while running. Half sizing great for me. Plenty of cushioning, which I find essential as and older runner. A bit pricey but no more than other lead brands. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: patrick farrell

customer_reviews.title: Very good customer service by Nencini Sport
customer_reviews.text: I would like to express my gratitude for the swift delivery of the shoes from Italy to Portugal, it took only a few days. Great service. I am not commenting on this shoe: I have used Brooks Glycerin for years now, so they are the perfect shoe for me. But, a running shoe does not serve everyone. Different running styles, different purpose (street, short/long distance, trial, frequent, less frequent use) make that everyone needs a shoe that serves him or her best. Do not buy shoes over the internet if you have not assessed your needs or tried these shoes before. Happy runnings!

product_meta.title: Brooks Men's Glycerin 16 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The new Brooks DNA LOFTS cushioning is created to ensure a feeling of softness underfoot without affecting reactivity and efficiency. The incredibly soft DNA LOFTS special area gives you an extraordinary feeling. The new Fit Print upper in 3 D technology even further improves the quality of your step.
feature_bullets: Brooks brand-new DNA LOFT cushioning is engineered to provide a luxurious feeling underfoot without losing responsiveness and durability.
The DNA LOFT transition zone makes every move from heel to toe feel incredibly soft and smooth.
If your feet could speak, they'd thank you. Our newly engineered 3D Fit Print mesh upper and internal stretch bootie surround your foot in softness, expanding and contracting with your stride.
The new, Double Jacquard Mesh is engineered for strategic breathability, flexibility, and structure.
IDEAL Pressure Zones evenly disperse impact away from your body for an effortless ride.
